reviewText: didnt notice it was region 2 but it opened up our eyes to a whole new way of watching one of our favorite genres : British !! Originals from England! Just have to find a decent region 2 dvd player now.
It a great gift for those you don't know what to buy. The boxset with the 1st and 2nd season is a great combination.
As a fan of British shows, this one stands out. Certainly the best comedy since Python. The show really picks up in season two, when Matt Berry enters the scene.
i love the show so i bought the box set it came fast and was in great condition and i love the box art!

These dvds and most from this seller are Region 2 and are not labeled so. I've had this happen3 times, twice my fault, because I didn't know what regions on DVDs meant. This time it was not even labeled so zoverstock is liable.
I looked for the format on the ad before purchasing, and it didn't say anywhere.  Was extremely disappointed that I couldn't watch it!  wasted money and wasted excitement as I love this show.

While I love the show, and I wanted it on DVD so I ordered it. I was disapointed when I recieved the set and it wouldnt play in my dvd player because the discs aren't made for the US (region 1). They are region 2 discs for the UK.

I went for this "good deal" and it turns out to be Region 2 DVD's that won't work in the US.

You would think the seller might mention this before shipping to a US address.
This is a sitcom based on Nerds in an IT office with an computer illiterate manager. They work for an outrageously ridiculous executive and it all conspires to be one hilariously funny show.
